name: Sole Active Thin Footbeds - Unisex
description:
Soft yet supportive insoles designed for active use. Thin enough to wear with tight-fitting footwear that has thin or no built-in insoles, such as cycling shoes, slim running shoes or ski boots.Foam base is made with 20% recycled EVA.Heat-and-wear mouldable for a comfortable and personalized fit.Polygiene® antimicrobial treatment resists odour buildup.Moisture-wicking top sheet helps feet stay dry and comfortable.Latex-free and vegan.

        Sustainability
